{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=PLW1000 |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin=B01B5CTRGE |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/01/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=Powerline Access Point, extender |fcc_id=PY326200346 |ic_id=4054A-26200346 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47189B0;BCM47189B0KRFBG;HN1603 P20; 566944-71 P3A W; |cpu1_cspeed=900 |cpu2_brand=Broadcom |cpu2_model=BCM60350;BCM60350KRFBG;TN1613 P11;P4RL-18 P3 W |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W631GG6KB-15 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM47189B0;BCM47189B0KRFBG;HN1603 P20; 566944-71 P3A W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV, SISO |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Netgear##_EXT, Netgear##-5G_EXT |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=http://www.mywifiext.net |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Powerline WiFi 1000}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/powerline/PLW1000.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=PLW1000v2}}
The device uses [[Broadcom]] BCM60350 as the HomePlug controller.
Default access: http://www.mywifiext.net
Sold in a kit consisting of: *One (1) PowerLine WiFi 1000 Access Point ([[Netgear PLW1000v2]]) *One (1) PowerLine 1000 Adapter ([[Netgear PL1000v2]])
